definition: step with the left foot (Kangxi radical 60)/see also 彳亍[chi4 chu4]

pinyin: zu3 zhi1 jiang1 mei2 jun1 bing4

sentences.english: To clarify the safety of Monascus and Chinese traditional medicine synbiotics.
sentences.chinese: 闡明紅曲黴與健胃中藥合生素的安全性。

sentences.english: I'm up to my neck in you bullshit.
sentences.chinese: 你讓我倒了八輩子的黴了。

sentences.english: I scavenged this whole moldy musty place for rats, Beak.
sentences.chinese: 我搜遍這個又黴又爛的地方找老鼠，比克。

sentences.english: It was filled with mildewed boxes.
sentences.chinese: 這裏到處都是發了黴的箱子。

sentences.english: Excessive seeding rates produce turf that is less stress tolerant and more susceptible to damping off.
sentences.chinese: 播種過量也會使草坪抗逆性變差並且更易腐黴枯萎。

sentences.english: On returning, he noticed that one of the dishes had gone mouldy.
sentences.chinese: 回來後他注意到其中一個已經長了黴。

sentences.english: And the chair is becoming quite mucky and damp.
sentences.chinese: 那把椅子搞到相當髒，還有點黴溼。

sentences.english: Monascus possesses certain fermenting power and strong esterifying power.
sentences.chinese: 紅曲黴具有一定的發酵力及較強的酯化力。

sentences.english: Buckwheat Solid-State Fermentation by Monascus and Analising and Determination of the Products;
sentences.chinese: 綜述了紅曲黴及其發酵產物的研究概況。

sentences.english: They returned to La Trappe in 1815.
sentences.chinese: 他們回到1815年香格里拉黴。

sentences.english: All the bread of their food supply was dry and moldy.
sentences.chinese: 他們所帶的餅都是乾的，長了黴了。

sentences.english: Allergenicity of Gliocladium sp. has not been well studied.
sentences.chinese: 由粘帚黴引發的過敏還沒有很好的研究過。

sentences.english: If you have had a bad day, still greet them with pleasure and a big smile.
sentences.chinese: 即便你倒了一天黴，也要微笑豁達着面對。

sentences.english: HPLC method of analysis of Monascus citrinin was established.
sentences.chinese: 建立了紅曲黴真菌毒素桔黴素的HPLC檢測方法。

definition: confused/dizzy/giddy/to faint/to swoon/to lose consciousness/to pass out
to choke (because of swallowing the wrong way)
to irritate the nose/to choke (of smoke, smell etc)/pungent/(coll.) (Tw) to shout at sb/to scold/to speak out against sb
thick paste of fermented soybean/marinated in soy paste/paste/jam
